Title: Relates to an examination and evaluation of New York state's information technology infrastructure
Summary: Directs the office of information technology services to contract with a private entity to conduct an examination and evaluation of New York state's information technology infrastructure, data use and management, policies, procedures and operational processes.
LawCode: Amd ยง103, St Tech L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state technology law, in relation to conducting an examination and evaluation of New York state's information technology infrastructure, data use and management, policies, procedures and operational processes; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
